name: Photo & Video Downloader for Instagram
description: InstaSave for Instagram helps you to fast download and repost videos & photos from Instagram and IGTV without login. 100% free and safe!  With free Instagram downloader, you can easily save Instagram videos and photos directly to your gallery in just one tap. View offline, share, repost, delete saved posts as you like.   To save Instagram videos/photos with other downloaders, you must log in to Instagram and scroll to that video/photo again. This is quite inconvenient, and sometimes its not safe to log in to Instagram via a third party. While with InstaSave, you do not need to log in. Just tap share to or copy link of the post and the download auto starts. Its that easy and safe!  How to Use Option 1: Share Link  1. Open Instagram and click Share to... of the post 2. Select InstaSave  3. Download auto starts  Option 2: Copy Link 1. Open Instagram and click Copy Link of the post  2. Return  3. Download auto starts  Features * No login required * Easily and fast save Instagram videos and photos to your gallery * Support download all HD videos and photos * Download multiple photos in one Instagram post * Play downloaded videos offline with the built-in player * View saved videos & photos offline and share with friends * Repost, rename, share, delete downloads with powerful download manager * Download Instagram videos with hashtags and caption, easy for reposting * IGTV downloader * Small size and lightweight Instagram downloader tool  All in One Downloader * InstaSave for Instagram - save Instagram posts directly to the gallery * Instagram video downloader - fast download HD videos from Instagram/IGTV * Instagram photo downloader - save Instagram photos and share with friends * Repost app for Instagram - easily repost saved Instagram videos and photos * Download manager - share, repost, and delete downloads as you like  InstaSave Disclaimer * This app is not associated with Instagram * Please get the PERMISSION from the owner before you repost videos and photos * We are not responsible for any intellectual property violation that results from an unauthorized repost of a video or photo  Instagram downloader Instagram downloader is a full-featured downloading app for Instagram.
